question_text:
Question 34 
 
 
 
 
 
 
[Geotechnical Engineering : Pile Foundation]
  
 
A reinforced concrete pile of 10 m length and 0.7 m diameter is embedded in a saturated pure clay with 
unit cohesion of 50 kPa. If the adhesion factor is 0.5, the net ultimate uplift pullout capacity (in kN) of 
the pile is _________ (rounded off to the nearest integer). 
Ans.
 
545 to 555
